titleStmt.title: Description of Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library, Halper 34: Song of Solomon 2:13-3:3; Song of Solomon 4:6-14

publicationStmt.publisher: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

notesStmt.note: Fol. 1 contains II 13 התאנה – III 3 השומרים; fol. 2 contains IV 6 ואהלות 14 - אלך; no text breaks marked; written tradition (ketiv) consistently ignored in favor of verbal tradition (keri) in II 13, 15 and IV 9; a few variants from the standard Masoretic text in plane orthography.

msIdentifier.repository: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

msItem.title: Song of Solomon 2:13-3:3; Song of Solomon 4:6-14

layoutDesc.layout: Columns: 1; lines: 10; ruling method: left rule justified by filler of 1-2 characters from anticipated word, or by stretching the last character or one before it.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Hebrew Oriental square vocalization and cantillation (Tiberian)

history.provenance: Cairo Genizah Collection (University of Pennsylvania. Center for Advanced Judaic Studies. Library).
